item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s some books or articles I’d recommend. I can’t claim this list is some sort of cohesive narrative, but I’d say all of these have something of merit regardless of political persuasion. I will add to this. Politics Leviathan, Thomas Hobbes. It is basically a meme at this point in some circles, but this is a classic for a reason. This was the first port of call for my undergrad political theory course and it will deservedly remain at the top of undergrad reading lists for decades to come.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via email.
